required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: An Open Label, Randomized, 2-Period, Crossover Study to Establish the Definitive Bioequivalence of Niacin and MK0524 of 2 Sources of MK0524A Tablets

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate the definitive bioequivalence of tablets of MK0524A (1000 mg Extended Release (ER) Niacin/ 20 mg laropiprant) from two sources.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of Nicotinuric Acid
primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 24 hours postdose
primary_outcome.description: Measure of rate of absorption of ER niacin

primary_outcome.measure: Total Amount of Urinary Excretion of Niacin and Its Metabolites
primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 96 hours postdose
primary_outcome.description: Measure of extent of absorption of ER niacin

primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 48 hours postdose
primary_outcome.description: Measure of extent of absorption of laropiprant

primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 48 hours postdose
primary_outcome.description: Measure of rate of absorption of laropiprant

intervention.description: Single dose of MK0524A (ER Niacin/laropiprant 1000/20 mg) from Source 1 in one of two treatment periods.
Single dose of MK0524A (ER Niacin/laropiprant 1000/20 mg) from Source 2 in one of two treatment periods.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject is in good health
- Subject is willing to follow all study guidelines
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject has or has a history of any disease or condition that might confound the results of the study or make participation unsafe

group.title: MK0524A Phase III Tablet Then MK0524A New Site Tablet
group.description: MK0524A Phase III tablet: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg MK0524) Phase III tablet (Source 1)/MK0524A New Site tablet: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg MK0524) tablet from new manufacturing site (Source 2)

group.title: MK0524A New Site Tablet Then MK0524A Phase III Tablet
group.description: MK0524A New Site tablet: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg MK0524) tablet from new manufacturing site (Source 2)/ MK0524A Phase III tablet: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg MK0524) Phase III tablet (Source 1)

group.title: All Participants
group.description: Includes all participants from Both treatment groups; MK0524A Phase III tablet and MK0524A New Site tablet

outcome.title: Maximum Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of Nicotinuric Acid
outcome.description: Measure of rate of absorption of ER niacin
outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 24 hours postdose
outcome.population: The Hodges-Lehmann estimator was used to analyze nicotinuric acid Cmax and uses only subjects with data available on both treatment periods. 188 subjects were randomized,17 subjects discontinued, 26 subjects were inadvertently overdosed with 5 tablets of MK0524A 1000 mg/20 mg, reducing the available subject population for analysis to 145.

group.title: MK0524A New Site Tablet
group.description: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg laropiprant) tablet from new manufacturing site (Source 2)

group.title: MK0524A Phase III Tablet
group.description: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg laropiprant) Phase III tablet (Source 1)

measure.title: Maximum Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of Nicotinuric Acid
measure.description: Measure of rate of absorption of ER niacin
measure.population: The Hodges-Lehmann estimator was used to analyze nicotinuric acid Cmax and uses only subjects with data available on both treatment periods. 188 subjects were randomized,17 subjects discontinued, 26 subjects were inadvertently overdosed with 5 tablets of MK0524A 1000 mg/20 mg, reducing the available subject population for analysis to 145.

analysis.groups_desc: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg MK-laropiprant) tablet from new manufacturing site (Source 2) MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg MK-laropiprant) Phase III tablet (Source 1)
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: Primary research hypothesis I: The Cmax of nicotinuric acid (NUA) following the administration of MK0524A (ER niacin 1000 mg/ laropiprant 20 mg) tablets from 2 manufacturing sites is similar (i.e., the true GMR of NUA Cmax is contained within the bioequivalence interval (0.80, 1.25)).

outcome.title: Total Amount of Urinary Excretion of Niacin and Its Metabolites
outcome.description: Measure of extent of absorption of ER niacin
outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 96 hours postdose
outcome.population: A linear mixed effect model was used to analyze total amount of urinary excretion of niacin and its metabolite and uses data available from at least one treatment period. 157 subjects had data from the treatment of MK0524A New Site Tablet, and 161 subjects had data from the treatment of MK0524A Phase III Tablet

group.title: MK0524A New Site Tablet
group.description: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg laropiprant) tablet from new manufacturing site (Source 2)

group.title: MK0524A Phase III Tablet
group.description: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg laropiprant) Phase III tablet (Source 1)

measure.title: Total Amount of Urinary Excretion of Niacin and Its Metabolites
measure.description: Measure of extent of absorption of ER niacin
measure.population: A linear mixed effect model was used to analyze total amount of urinary excretion of niacin and its metabolite and uses data available from at least one treatment period. 157 subjects had data from the treatment of MK0524A New Site Tablet, and 161 subjects had data from the treatment of MK0524A Phase III Tablet

analysis.groups_desc: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg MK-laropiprant) tablet from new manufacturing site (Source 2) MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg MK-laropiprant) Phase III tablet (Source 1)
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: Primary research hypothesis II: The total urinary excretion of niacin and niacin metabolites following the administration of MK0524 (ER niacin 1000 mg/ laropiprant 20 mg) tablets from 2 manufacturing sites is similar (i.e., the true GMR of total urinary excretion of niacin and its metabolites is contained within the bioequivalence interval (0.80, 1.25)).

outcome.title: Area Under Curve (AUC 0-infinity) of Laropiprant
outcome.description: Measure of extent of absorption of laropiprant
outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 48 hours postdose
outcome.population: A linear mixed effect model was used to analyze laropiprant AUC0-infinity and uses data available from at least one treatment period. 166 subjects had data from the treatment of MK0524A New Site Tablet, and 167 subjects had data from the treatment of MK0524A Phase III Tablet

group.title: MK0524A New Site Tablet
group.description: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg laropiprant) tablet from new manufacturing site (Source 2)

group.title: MK0524A Phase III Tablet
group.description: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg laropiprant) Phase III tablet (Source 1)

measure.title: Area Under Curve (AUC 0-infinity) of Laropiprant
measure.description: Measure of extent of absorption of laropiprant
measure.population: A linear mixed effect model was used to analyze laropiprant AUC0-infinity and uses data available from at least one treatment period. 166 subjects had data from the treatment of MK0524A New Site Tablet, and 167 subjects had data from the treatment of MK0524A Phase III Tablet

analysis.groups_desc: Group B: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg MK-laropiprant) tablet from new manufacturing site (Source 2) Group A: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg MK-laropiprant) Phase III tablet (Source 1)
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: Primary research hypothesis III: The AUC0-infinity of laropiprant following the administration of MK0524A (ER niacin 1000 mg/ laropiprant 20 mg) tablets from 2 manufacturing sites is similar (i.e., the true GMR of MK0524 AUC0-∞ is contained within the bioequivalence interval (0.80, 1.25)).

outcome.title: Maximum Concentration (Cmax) of Laropiprant
outcome.description: Measure of rate of absorption of laropiprant
outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 48 hours postdose
outcome.population: A linear mixed effect model was used to analyze laropiprant Cmax and uses data available from at least one treatment period. 166 subjects had data from the treatment of MK0524A New Site Tablet, and 167 subjects had data from the treatment of MK0524A Phase III Tablet.

group.title: MK0524A New Site Tablet
group.description: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg laropiprant) tablet from new manufacturing site (Source 2)

group.title: MK0524A Phase III Tablet
group.description: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg laropiprant) Phase III tablet (Source 1)

measure.title: Maximum Concentration (Cmax) of Laropiprant
measure.description: Measure of rate of absorption of laropiprant
measure.population: A linear mixed effect model was used to analyze laropiprant Cmax and uses data available from at least one treatment period. 166 subjects had data from the treatment of MK0524A New Site Tablet, and 167 subjects had data from the treatment of MK0524A Phase III Tablet.

analysis.groups_desc: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg MK-laropiprant) tablet from new manufacturing site (Source 2) MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg MK-laropiprant) Phase III tablet (Source 1)
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: Primary research hypothesis IV: The Cmax of laropiprant following the administration of MK0524A (ER niacin 1000 mg/ laropiprant 20 mg) tablets from 2 manufacturing sites is similar (i.e., the true GMR of MK0524 Cmax is contained within the bioequivalence interval (0.80, 1.25)).

group.title: MK0524A Phase III Tablet
group.description: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg laropiprant) Phase III tablet (Source 1)

group.title: MK0524A New Site Tablet
group.description: MK0524A (1000 mg ER Niacin/20 mg laropiprant) tablet from new manufacturing site (Source 2)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Merck agreements may vary with individual investigators, but will not prohibit any investigator from publishing. Merck supports the publication of results from all centers of a multi-center trial but requests that reports based on single-site data not precede the primary publication of the entire clinical trial.

point_of_contact.name_or_title: Senior Vice President, Global Clinical Development
